skill.name: Master Orchestrator
skill.summary: Workflow automation skill that orchestrates content generation and viral verification pipelines
skill.author: Defou

content.user_title: Automate content pipeline from trending to publish
content.value_statement: This skill automates the entire content creation workflow from discovering trending topics to publishing viral-ready posts. It orchestrates multiple AI skills to generate, score, and optimize content automatically.
actual_capabilities: Orchestrates content generation and quality verification skills in sequence
Scans TopHub for trending topics and identifies top 10 viral candidates
Generates initial drafts using Defou x Stanley content style
Scores content against 6 viral factors and provides optimization suggestions
limitations: Only orchestrates specific skills - does not generate content directly
Requires other skills (tophub-defou-stanley-combo, viral-verification) to be installed
Depends on project-level .env configuration for API keys and settings

use_cases.title: Automate viral content
use_cases.description: Generate and optimize content for social media without manual research or editing

use_cases.title: Scale content production
use_cases.description: Create multiple optimized posts daily by running the complete pipeline automatically

use_cases.title: Quality-controlled output
use_cases.description: Ensure all published content meets viral potential criteria before distribution

prompt_templates.title: Run full pipeline
prompt_templates.prompt: Run the master orchestrator to create viral content from current trends

prompt_templates.title: Generate with style
prompt_templates.prompt: Use master orchestrator to generate posts following the Defou x Stanley style

prompt_templates.title: Verify and optimize
prompt_templates.prompt: Run the quality verification engine to score and optimize the generated drafts

prompt_templates.title: End-to-end workflow
prompt_templates.prompt: Execute the complete pipeline: discover trends, generate top 10 posts, verify quality, and prepare final output

output_examples.input: Run master orchestrator to create viral content
output: Verified posts scored: 7.2-8.9 on viral potential scale
Final optimized posts saved to outputs/viral-verified-posts/
Top recommendation: Post #3 achieved highest engagement prediction

best_practices: Configure all API keys in the project's .env file before running
Review viral verification scores to understand optimization suggestions
Run the pipeline regularly to capture emerging trends quickly
anti_patterns: Running without required dependent skills installed
Skipping the viral verification step for time-sensitive content
Modifying output directories without updating skill references

faq.question: What skills does this orchestrator call?
faq.answer: It coordinates tophub-defou-stanley-combo for content generation and viral-verification for quality scoring.

faq.question: Do I need to install other skills first?
faq.answer: Yes, both tophub-defou-stanley-combo and viral-verification must be installed for this to work.

faq.question: Where are the generated posts saved?
faq.answer: Drafts go to outputs/defou-stanley-posts/ and final verified posts go to outputs/viral-verified-posts/

faq.question: What does the viral verification score mean?
faq.answer: The 6-dimensional score (1-10) evaluates hooks, emotions, structure, readability, engagement, and timeliness.

faq.question: Can I skip the verification step?
faq.answer: The orchestrator runs both stages sequentially. You can run just the generation skill if verification is not needed.

faq.question: How do I configure API keys?
faq.answer: Add your API credentials to the project's .env file. No additional configuration is required for this skill.
